mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sender_office_id AS "senderOfficeId", o.name AS "senderOfficeName", a.sender_id AS "senderId", u.name AS "senderName", a.receiver_ids AS "receiverIds", a.receiver_names AS "receiverNames", a.receiver_openids AS "receiverOpenids", a.content AS "content", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.audit_by AS "auditBy", a.audit_date AS "auditDate", a.audit_status AS "auditStatus", a.audit_reason AS "auditReason"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o on o.code = a.sender_office_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = a.sender_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_audit_wx( id, sender_office_id, sender_id, receiver_ids, receiver_names, receiver_openids, content, create_by, create_date, audit_by, audit_date, audit_status, audit_reason ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{senderOfficeId}, #{senderId}, #{receiverIds}, #{receiverNames}, #{receiverOpenids}, #{content}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{auditBy}, #{auditDate}, #{auditStatus}, #{auditReason} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_audit_wx SET sender_office_id = #{senderOfficeId}, sender_id = #{senderId}, receiver_ids = #{receiverIds}, receiver_names = #{receiverNames}, receiver_openids = #{receiverOpenids}, content = #{content}, audit_by = #{auditBy}, audit_date = #{auditDate}, audit_status = #{auditStatus}, audit_reason = #{auditReason} WHERE id = #{id}
